snippet: The Royal Bank of Scotland said on Friday that it would probably face financial penalties connected to the rate-rigging investigation, as the British bank reported a net loss in the third quarter of the year.
abstract: The Royal Bank of Scotland said on Friday that it would probably face financial penalties connected to the rate-rigging investigation, as the British bank reported a net loss in the third quarter of the year.

headline.main: R.B.S. Expects Fine Over Libor Investigation
headline.print_headline: Royal Bank of Scotland Braces for Libor Penalties
